articles.title: Beware of Signs That Confirm COVID-19 is Spreading in Your Lungs - India.com
articles.description: Here, we tell you about a few warning signs to look for in order to avoid the development of COVID-19 complications.
articles.content: COVID-19 is associated with various complications and the most severe ones begin appearing when the SARS-CoV-2 starts spreading in your lungs. This is the time when your condition may start worsening… [+1361 chars]
